posted:Posted May 22, 2024
msg:When I first walked through the doors of this beautiful hotel‚Ä¶I was shocked. It was like walking through heaven! The staff were so helpful in taking my suitcases, bringing them to my room, and helping me check-in smoothly. I was a little hesitant about not being able to have my room ready since I was checking in at 10am but they were so nice in making sure I had a room and they made this happen through upgrading my friend and I to a larger room! Not only did this make the stay even more enjoyable but the breakfast and pool were also amazing! My pool is huge and clean, but you must wear a swimming cap which they can give you at the front desk before you enter the pool! The pool closes at 11pm which is amazing if you‚Äôre a late night swimmer! Breakfast, on the second floor, definitely did not disappoint me as they had a great variety of western and Chinese breakfast. From hash browns, to bacon, to pastries, to fruits! You can definitely get full with this breakfast! I will definitely be coming again in the near future!

msg:The building is beautiful, and the bedrooms are very comfortable. By and large we slept very well. However, there are annoying, "Ryanair-like" little scams that do not make you feel in a five-stars hotel. We were charged an extra 30 RMB for no reason for the room, an extra 20 RMB for peanuts that we did not order at the bar, 60 RMB for a bottle of water in the room, etc. We were also disturbed unnecessarily at 10 pm in our room (first by a phone call, then by an employee who forced us to answer the phone call), apparently because one employee had refunded us by mistake. I later suggested the manager make a gesture in return, and to this day I'm still waiting.

name:F‚Äça‚Äçr‚Äçe‚Äçe‚Äçd‚Äç ‚ÄçM‚Äça‚Äçd‚Äçe‚Äçe‚Äçy‚Äça
info:Deluxe Double Room
info:Stayed in February 2024
info:Solo travelers
info:3 Reviews
rating:4.7
posted:Posted April 22, 2024
msg:Bonjour Beijing! 

Love the Parisian vibe of this hotel. The aesthetic is so beautiful right from the lobby to the room. It has very comfy bed and pillow so soft you it's all you need after full day of walking.

The swimming pool is simply stunning. You need to wear swim cap to use it and can be purchased at the front desk. It has sauna and jacuzzi at the back.

The breakfast buffet was decent, mostly Chinese with few western dishes. It is located very near to shopping haven Wangfujing street. However, there is no convenience stores nearby so need to walk a little bit.

Didi Taxi only cost USD10 from PEK airport to get here.

name:T‚Äçr‚Äça‚Äçv‚Äçe‚Äçl‚Äçf‚Äçr‚Äçe‚Äçe
info:Deluxe Double Room
info:Stayed in January 2023
info:Couples
info:17 Reviews
rating:4.5
posted:Posted January 12, 2023
msg:This hotel is located quite centrally and is nearby all the tourist sights (Tian an men, gugong etc.). It is an old hotel, the hall on entrance to the hotel is very grand and spacious, but is indicative if the age of the hotel. In the room,  some of the equipment is quite dated, the TV and other appliances have all seen better days. But that is okay, thanks to its location you won't be spending too much time in the room using the TV. The walls are cracking and paint is peeling off around some parts of the room, and the carpet had an old burn mark but this is all to be expected from an older hotel, and for the price it was really great value. The bed and pillows were really comfortable and clean, and the bathroom was also well cleaned and taken care of. Overall it is an old, but good hotel and well worth the price.
----------------------------------------

name:S‚Äçh‚Äça‚Äçn‚Äçt‚Äçe‚Äçl
info:Premier Deluxe Room (Double bed)
info:Stayed in July 2021
info:Solo travelers
info:43 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted July 11, 2021
msg:The exterior and interior of this hotel is simply beautiful. It feels as though you are walking inside a museum in Paris. The decor is a wonderful blend of blues, golds, whites, and diamonds. The service here is exceptional. Ms. Bacaloni in the french restaurant was especially kind and attentive. The rooms have an equally beautiful french vibe with plenty of amenities and high quality products such as L‚ÄôOccitNe and a huge comfy bed. They also have things that other hotels should consider implementing such as labeling the light switches and a small bench for the shower room. I noticed that the paint on the shower room ceiling is peeling off a little but no big deal. 

The location is excellent too; 5 minute walk from the subway station, 30 minutes away from the south railway station by train, and plenty of restaurants, malls, and attractions around.

The western and Chinese food served in the french restaurant is delicious, however I deeply regretted paying 150 for the Chinese buffet as the food was surprisingly average. 

Overall, if you have the budget, then this place is practically perfect and I will definitely consider staying here again when I get the chance to go to Beijing again. 
----------------------------------------

msg:I am very happy to review Beijing Legend Residence Hotel, which ranks third in the luxury hotel rankings. I have to say that the service here does not match the star rating of the hotel. It is extremely poor.
I initially booked a two-bedroom apar**ent, which I admit was very cheap, costing just over two thousand, so no one called me that day to confirm who was staying. But on the same day, we also booked a room at the Ritz-Carlton, which was only 1,000 more expensive than that room. They called us in the morning to ask for information about the guests and our needs, so that they could prepare in advance.
I thought maybe the room booked at Legend was too cheap, and the room I was booking that day was a wedding room, so there would be more additional demand, so I immediately upgraded to the most expensive Legend suite that could be booked on the platform. Not surprisingly, there is no difference at all.
After arriving at the hotel, the hotel's service did not disappoint me at all. Except for the guy who opened the door and the young girl at the front desk, there was no one who would not give you a bad look, talk and ignore you, and ask for a single request. , but I just can‚Äôt do it.
When I got off the car, I told the security guard at the door to contact the concierge to move the luggage to the room. I went to check in, but no one took care of it. In the end, my friend went to the concierge to get a courtesy car to move it up. Before I came here, I sent a few boxes to the hotel, and I asked the concierge to help me move them to my room later. I said I would be leaving soon, so I wouldn‚Äôt move them up myself. The head concierge put on a stinky face like "I owe him 1.8 million". Without raising his eyes, he told me that he couldn't move things in without a room card. This was the first time I heard that a five-star hotel requires guests to carry luggage into the room. The person accompanying me is still a supervisor.
I needed to book a conference room for the night, so I called room service and asked me to find him on the next floor. He would wait for us in the elevator. We didn't see anyone after we got down, so we thought he was slow to arrive and we waited for a while. It turned out that this guy was chatting with someone in the lobby (which is not the same place as the elevator room). We went over and asked them if they knew about the appoin**ent with the room service depar**ent. After checking whether the person in the room came, he said it was him who made the appoin**ent, "Yes, it's me, what's wrong?"
Yes, as expected, it‚Äôs another man with a bad face. I said, didn‚Äôt you say that we can see you when we come down to the elevator? We don‚Äôt recognize you. How can we find you when you run to the lobby? ‚ÄúI‚Äôll take you to the conference room now.‚Äù "Okay?" "..." I really have nothing to say.
Generally speaking, I have a very bad experience about this hotel that day. It is a lightning protection. I will not stay here again in the future. Don't spend money to make trouble.

name:J‚Äçi‚Äçn‚Äçg‚Äçy‚Äçi
info:Busniess Suite (Gift package)
info:Stayed in December 2023
info:Family
info:17 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted January 1, 2024
msg:Second brush Legend~
It is also a promise to my mother.
At the beginning of the year, post-impotence syndrome caused my mother to become seriously ill.
At that time, I promised my mother that I would bring her to stay at the Castle Hotel after she recovered. Today I have fulfilled my promise
Bring your parents to Legendale for New Year‚Äôs Eve~
This time I booked a business suite with three meals and afternoon tea.
The advantage of the suite is that it has a living room, which is more suitable for two families like ours to spend the New Year together.
Children have a place to play, and the elderly also have a place to sit, drink tea and chat!

Room facilities:
Although it has been open for several years, it is not outdated and can be said to be still magnificent.
parking:
Register your room number and license plate number with the concierge to enjoy a 50% discount on the fare (park in the underground garage)

Room view:
City view! I prefer to see the view in the corridor and inside the hotel! I really like the design of Legend!

Location transportation:
Extremely convenient! Get off at Dengshikou Station on Line 5, exit from Exit C, and walk no more than 500 meters. From the main road, you can recognize Legend Hotel at a glance by its architectural style.

Serve:
Personally, I think it‚Äôs great!
Whether it‚Äôs the doorman, the front desk, or the room attendant. In my opinion, as long as you are not deliberately looking for trouble, their service is impeccable!

Dining room:
Because of the New Year's Eve, the cafe where we originally ate became a seafood buffet restaurant, 1088 people!
By the way, when I passed by the coffee shop, it was really fresh, the smell of the sea~ The meals included in the room were all eaten in the French restaurant on the second floor! We also accept individual guests, 188 people per person!
Personally, I feel that you can definitely be full! Although there are not many types of dishes, there will always be three or two dishes that you like! It is absolutely no problem to be full!
As long as you recognize the price and are not too picky, you will have a good dining experience.
In my impression, the meals during the Spring Festival and the lunch on the second day are slightly better than the dinner on the first day.
I look forward to mom and dad having a better dining experience on the first lunch of the New Year.
To all the hotel staff and people who read this review, Happy New Year!

name:G‚Äçu‚Äçe‚Äçs‚Äçt‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr

info:Stayed in January 2024
info:Business travelers
posted:Posted January 13, 2024
rating:5
msg:I came to see the exhibition at the Palace Museum and booked the nearby Legend Hotel, which is within walking distance. The hotel was opened in 2008. The lobby is very grand, with a seating area and a water bar. Check-in is very fast, and the service attitude is warm but not excessive.
Hotel facilities: The facilities can be seen to be a bit old, but they are well maintained. It can be seen that the hotel was very careful when it opened. The room is very large, the bathroom shower has a large flow of water and the water temperature is right, which is very good. The hand soap and toiletries are from L'Occitane, which is highly praised. In particular, the room has sockets in every place where power may be needed, which can accommodate different power sources. It is currently the most convenient hotel for charging.
Hygiene: The hotel room is very clean and there are basically no dead spots. It would be better if an alcohol tablet is prepared for the toilet to wipe.
Service: The hotel service is also very good. When I called the service phone, I was connected quickly. I was so thirsty that day that I ordered a fruit plate and freshly squeezed juice, which were all fresh.
Breakfast: The breakfast restaurant is not very big, but every meal tastes good and the ingredients are very fresh.
Overall, I am very satisfied with my stay

name:h‚Äça‚Äçk‚Äçk‚Äçi‚Äçn‚Äçi‚Äçn‚Äçe
info:Apartment Suite - 2-Bedroom
info:Stayed in September 2023
info:Family
info:1 Review
rating:3.5
posted:Posted September 15, 2023
msg:I originally lived in the Regent opposite, but traveling with my parents to get an extra bed was a nigh**are. No matter how good the hotel is, I decided to move to a two-bedroom suite. It was the right decision. Here are a few tips:
1. The suite is really great. Although the facilities are old, the space is excellent, and the dynamic and quiet areas are divided. The old-school European decoration is different from the business hotel style, giving people a special home feeling, friendly and comfortable. (My house also has wainscoting.
2. The scenic spot is downstairs. When parents get up early, they can go for a walk downstairs first, have breakfast, then go upstairs for a lunch break at noon, and then go out after resting. Simply a perfect experience.
3. The bedroom has good lighting and area, and the living room is so comfortable. No matter how good the five-star standard room is, it cannot be compared.
4. The facilities are indeed old. After all, it was a high-end hotel 15 years ago.
5. The service cannot be said to be particularly good, mainly compared with the service at Regent the night before. There is still a gap. For example, when picking up luggage at the entrance, the smiling service is a bit poor. In the lobby, there are fewer people than Regent. It's all in the subtleties, but the impression is obvious.

Summary: The experience of the two-bedroom suite covers all flaws. I will come again next time I bring my parents! It is recommended that anyone traveling with three or more people try it!

When I checked out, I heard who it was. After thinking about it, I decided not to expose it. I have stayed in many places. Big hotel, this is the first time I have encountered this situation. The hotel should check and improve itself. Anyway, I will not come again.

3. The waiter was very enthusiastic. I asked for an extra quilt and a few bottles of water and brought them over quickly.
4. Seeing that we have an elderly person, the front desk took the initiative to upgrade the room. Thank you very much.
shortcoming:
1. The toilet seat in the room does not rebound slowly, and the sound of it falling is scary. You have to be mentally prepared. It is recommended to replace the toilet seat.
2. The food and drinks that require payment in the room are not clearly marked, making it easy to consume them without knowing it.
3. The toothbrushes are of the same color, making it difficult to distinguish whose toothbrush is whose.

name:C‚Äço‚Äçc‚Äço‚Äçh‚Äçu‚Äçb‚Äço
info:Deluxe Double Room
info:Stayed in February 2023
info:Couples
info:2 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted March 6, 2023
msg:City Vacation üè∞The most resort-like Legendary Hotel in Beijing
Last week, I had dinner with a girlfriend who had just returned from a business trip in Paris. The topic always revolved around the familiar French streets and food and wine. Feeling itchy for a while, I decisively booked the Legendale Hotel to give my soul a temporary vacation and take a trip to France, which is also a reward for myself before the Goddess Festival.

Why Choose Legendale Hotel Travel France? Although this hotel is located in the hinterland of Wangfujing, the core area of the capital, it has a gorgeous European-style building from head to toe. It is definitely a hotel with the strongest sense of vacation.

This is the second stay. Entering the lobby, looking at the super high hollow patio like a space-time tunnel, the surprise when I first saw it was replaced by the peace of mind when I saw an old friend. Compared with the period of yq, the flow of people staying here has indeed picked up significantly, everywhere is thriving, and I can't help but feel relieved.

This time I still stayed in the executive suite on the 16th floor, and it was still a set meal including four meals a day. The super high cost performance made people want to stop. It coincided with my family's birthday, and the hotel even made birthday decorations thoughtfully, which was really surprising!

The executive suite with super large space has the best view of Wangfujing. The bedroom enjoys the beautiful view of Jinbao Street. The living room is surrounded by Wangfujing. Moisturizing the outside creates a good mood; the design that can be opened for ventilation is my favorite, and the small terrace with iron railings outside the window has an authentic French style. The Jinbao Street in the sunset and the beautiful view of the CBD in the distance are also soft and romantic.

The four-meal stay package is all in the Bicui French restaurant in the hotel. Now it has returned to the buffet, the food is very good, and the drinks are unlimited. Once again, we are amazed by its super high cost performance! In such a standard French classical a**osphere, with the view of the city east of the Forbidden City outside the window, I am in a good mood!

For our family's birthday party, we didn't eat out, so we chose Haojiangxuan restaurant in the hotel. This is a restaurant that my family and I love very much. Haojiangxuan, which specializes in Huaiyang cuisine and Cantonese cuisine, has a baroque style and splendid dome design, which coincides with the Zhuangzheng of Chinese cuisine.

This time, it is also because Zhao Renliang, a veteran registered Chinese culinary master and state banquet master, is sitting here in person. This time, I am lucky to be able to taste hand-made fish ball soup, green mustard prawn balls, Hong Kong-style roast goose, etc. from Master Zhao.

msg:I have always liked European-style architecture. I wanted to find a beautiful hotel to take pictures on my birthday, so I chose Legend without hesitation. The hotel is older but still beautiful. The business suite includes a bedroom and a triangular hall. The layout is European-style, and I like it very much.
The hotel is indeed old, and its various facilities are incomparable with new five-star hotels. The golden decoration on the roof has been peeled off. The design of the bathroom is not good. The door of the shower room is not covered by frosted glass. Some people can't use the sink in the bathroom when taking a shower, otherwise they can see everything in the mirror. The shower room is very small. The water is also adjusted by yourself from the hot water on the left and the cold water on the right. If you want to temporarily turn off the hair conditioner or shower gel in the middle, you need to re-adjust it when you turn it on again.
The biggest advantage of this hotel is that the photos are very good, whether it is taken on the corner stairs from the first floor to the second floor, or in the restaurant on the second floor, on the terrace, or in the corridor outside the room.
The reserved business suite includes breakfast, lunch, dinner and afternoon tea for two people. I was a little happy when I made the reservation, and felt that the meal was completely resolved. It was only when I was eating that I realized that the meal was really bad. Afternoon tea is served by portion, and there are very few options. The dinner was even worse, but the roast goose was still edible. The breakfast is a little better, but it is only at the Samsung level. For lunch, only beef cheeks are delicious, tender, and nothing else. So if you book a room that includes meals, and you don‚Äôt have any requirements for food, you can eat it. If you need to pay for it yourself, don‚Äôt consider the hotel‚Äôs meals. The three meals are not worth more than 100.

name:X‚Äçi‚Äça‚Äço‚Äçs‚Äçh‚Äçe‚Äçn‚Äçs‚Äçh‚Äçe‚Äçn‚Äça‚Äçi‚Äçj‚Äçi‚Äça‚Äçr‚Äçe‚Äçn
info:Premier Deluxe Room (2 beds)
info:Stayed in February 2023
info:Family
info:4 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted February 12, 2023
msg:The Regal Hotel opened in the year of the 2008 Olympic Games. I heard that Bush Sr. and George W. Bush Jr. went to Beijing to attend the opening ceremony of the Olympic Games, and they were the first to stay at the Regal Hotel. My husband and I often go shopping in Wangfujing, and we always pass by here. My husband has always wanted to stay here once. During the epidemic, when we encountered holidays, we always looked for some hotels in the city to stay and rest. This time, I checked in to experience before the children started school. I booked a 3-day and 2-night Premier Club twin room, and the overall feeling is very good. The gentleman said that he will come again in the future!
After deciding to stay, I checked the reviews of Legendary Hotel on the Internet. According to my own experience, the overall feeling is as follows:
1. The location of the hotel is very good! Located in Wangfujing business district, not in the core area, close and not chaotic. Walk for about 5 minutes, you can go to Wangfujing Pedestrian Street, you can visit apm, Xindong'an, depar**ent stores, Wangfu Central, and strolled to Chang'an Avenue on the first night. On the second day of staying here, I walked around the hotel and walked to the Prime Minister's National Affairs Office (the former site), which was the office of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs after liberation in 1966, the former residence of Cai Yuanpei (Li Jiacai)! Across the road is Xiehe Hospital... This is an area where cultural relics gather, and you can take a stroll in the future.
2. The interior decoration of the hotel is very a**ospheric. After moving in, I found that someone was taking pictures here. We were taking pictures before dinner, and we hadn't finished taking pictures after dinner. The key is to change clothes and take pictures here. It can be seen that the decoration here is decorated towards "magnificence", which arouses others' interest in making a set of "blockbuster movies"! On the first floor there are antique fireplaces, antique vases, antique mirrors and clocks. The main tone of decoration here is golden yellow and marble, and there are many mirrors, so it has a "magnificent" feeling. The floor spacing is very large, and the room is also very spacious. It is very friendly to my father and son who are over 1.9 meters tall.
3. The hotel has complete facilities. There is only one row of guest rooms on each floor here, and because the middle is hollow, it looks even taller. The best thing about a row of rooms is that it is not noisy in the morning, unlike many hotels, which have aisles on the first floor and two rows of rooms, it is easy to be woken up in the morning. There is a lot of space in the room. In the room I stayed in, the two beds are 1.5 meters wide, almost catching up with the double bed! Although I read the reviews in advance, it said that the facilities in the room are outdated; the TV is relatively old, and there are few channels that can be changed; , National Geographic Channel, CCTV, Satellite TV, etc. are enough. I analyzed the reason for the cracks. The reason for the cracks is that the room is too hot. Beijing itself is relatively dry, and the temperature inside the house is relatively high in winter. The set temperature does not work, and it is always 26 degrees. I don't know if this is the reason. In addition to free mineral water, the premium room also has free drinks, and you can drink more water when the room is hot.
Fourth, the service attitude is very good. Many of the comments I saw before checking in affirmed the service attitude of the service staff. I also felt it when I checked in on the first day. When I checked in on the first day, the lady at the front desk said that there is no clean room yet, first help me to occupy a room with a bigger bed, and patiently explain the parking precautions to me, hotel guests park at B3, you can Go to the concierge to get a 50% off parking coupon. Write the check-in and check-out time on it, and it can be used repeatedly during the stay. In addition, I found that the hotel management attaches great importance to the opinions and suggestions of the guests, and has given feedback to the comments of the guests, not only in the comments on the Internet, but also in the actual work. A guest left a message and found that the curtains were transparent, and was woken up by the bright light in the morning. When I moved in this time, I found that a blackout curtain was added to the curtain box. Don't underestimate this one, it really blocks the light. Some residents reported that the courier boxes at the entrance on the first floor were left untidy, and they reported to the service staff at the entrance that they were harassed. This time, I discovered that a space was specially set up for express delivery, with two doors to separate the inside and the outside, and it can also serve takeaways to avoid random damage to the landscape. These are just what I have seen, and I believe that the hotel management will seriously consider the opinions and suggestions of hotel guests. Therefore, I also offer some small suggestions for reference.
5. Suggestions
1. The executive lounge will be restored soon! My family lives in a hotel now, and usually chooses an executive room, just for the trea**ent of the executive lounge. Even though lunch and dinner are simple meals, I still like the quiet environment of the executive lounge, where I like to rest, read books, watch the scenery, and be in a daze.
2. The temperature of the hot water can be lowered. Some hotel guests reported that the bath water is not easy to adjust! I also found this problem. It is recommended that hot water can lower the temperature. It is best to burn until the body temperature is between 39-45 degrees, so that there is no need to add cold water. Otherwise, the hot water is too hot, and the cold water is not well controlled, which will waste resources. Because, after finally adjusting the temperature, I don‚Äôt want to turn off the water. Many hotels have one regulator, and the Regal Hotel still has two switches to control the water temperature. I think the most convenient way is to keep the temperature from getting too high.
3. The indoor temperature can be adjusted by itself. Staying in the store for the past few days, I found that it was adjusted to 23 degrees, but it kept showing that the temperature in the house was 26 degrees. I didn't call for consultation, and felt that such a trivial matter would not bother the service staff. Maybe the room I stayed in had a broken thermostat? I didn't pay attention at the time, but I found that the room was too dry. After taking a bath at night, the ground was completely dry the next morning, and there was no trace of watermark at all. Because it was snowing outside, I didn't dare to turn off the heater at night. How to solve the dryness in the house, I haven't thought about it, I hope it can be solved too!
In short, the overall feeling is very good, suitable for family travel and living.
----------------------------------------

It is obvious that the staff has undergone strict training.
The only downside is that eggs are fried in the breakfast hall. There is no fume extraction equipment, and the fumes can't escape indoors. It needs to be improved.

msg:Children's fun vacation, children's summer vacation to the Legend Hotel for a weekend, choose a four-meal city vacation package, and enjoy afternoon tea, dinner, breakfast and lunch at the elegant Beacon French Restaurant, all of which are semi-buffet , The meals prepared in the self-service part are also very rich, and the overall feeling is quite affordable. The room contains two guests. Children under 1.2 meters are free, and children above 1.2 meters are half price. In addition, if you come by car, you can get half-price package coupons at the concierge. Very sweet.

After completing the check-in front desk, the children will be given two task cards. After completion, there will be corresponding gifts, which satisfies the children's curiosity and consumes a lot of physical strength. The best of both worlds! There are six antique treasures collected from France in the public area of the hotel. You can get a small gift by taking pictures at each stop of the "Legendary Treasure Hunting Manual" along the route of "Legendary Treasure Map" and sending them to social platforms. , candy or the puzzles of Legend Hotel, "Fun Questions and Answers for Cute Baby" is an advanced game, and then win small gifts üéÅ It is a customized Rubik's Cube with the appearance of the hotel. Children like it very much. It is entertaining and educational. Learn, this game is well arranged!

The room is very comfortable, and the scenery outside the window is very good. Looking up is the sunset, and looking down is Jinbao Street, which is full of traffic. It is very pleasant to rush to a cup of coffee and sit on the sofa beside the bed to watch the scenery! By the way, be sure to put on silk bathrobes and coral fleece slippers, too comfortable üòå The bathroom is glittering with gold, and the gold parts of the bathroom are plated with real gold, which is absolutely extravagant.

After checking out the next day, a friend came to see me, so I asked to have lunch at the hotel's Chinese restaurant. It is said that this restaurant has been renovated. It is like entering the opera house. It is also very beautiful. This restaurant specializes in Jiangnan cuisine. Ordered the seasonal hairy crab "June Yellow", which was launched in the season. The fried rice cake with sauce fragrant June yellow, the cream is full of fat, the shell is thin and the meat is thick, and the golden cream will burst out when you break it. The slight spicy taste is very fresh. The rice cake inside is soft and glutinous, although it is a bit spicy, but children can't stop eating it! I also ordered: eel paste with sound oil, smoked fish in this gang, stuffed meat with oil gluten, noodles in red oil soup, chicken feet in abalone sauce, none of them are classics.

The swimming pool is my favorite hotel facility with my children. With a safe height of 1.2 meters, there is no pressure to swim. There are not many tourists, and almost all of them are reserved. After swimming, I go to a hot spring and a sauna, which is too tired!

Taking photos in the hotel is a beautiful photo, there are treasures everywhere, like a shuttle in a museum, but also like breaking into someone's palace, like a dream!

msg:Legendale Hotel Beijing is a French royal castle next to the Forbidden City, with a French style close at hand. There is a strong and elegant 19th-century Parisian style and a blend of Chinese and Western cultures everywhere. Magnificent French design style, classical furniture and unique ceiling From the lobby, corridors, elevators, restaurants to room layout and decoration, it seems to return to the magnificent and elegant temperament, and it seems to return to France in an instant. The room is also retro, full of French style, suitable for Internet celebrities to punch cards. The room is full of details and the software is advanced. The washbasin and shower faucet in the bathroom are two retro 24k gold-plated hot water, which is only available in a classical and luxurious hotel. It is different from a faucet in a modern hotel. The guest amenities in the room are a full set of L'Occitane, the bathrobes are silk on the surface and towel lining, and the slippers are coral fleece, all of which are very luxurious and comfortable guest products. The well-equipped fitness center on the second floor is also a good place to fully relax. Executive floor rooms and all types of suites include executive floor trea**ent, and enjoy four meals a day for up to two people in the executive lounge, currently dining in the French restaurant. Four meals including breakfast, selected lunches, afternoon tea and selected dinners are excellent value for money. In Legendale Hotel Hao Jiangxuan Chinese Restaurant and Beatui French Restaurant, the dishes are dazzling and rich in variety. Hao Jiangxuan Chinese Restaurant also launched the seasonal hairy crab "June Yellow" in the season. June Yellow, Sauce-flavored June Yellow Fried Rice Cake, and Salt Baked June Yellow in Casserole. Each dish is full of oin**ent and fat, with thin shell and thick meat. As soon as you break it off, the golden oin**ent will burst out. It is sweet and smooth, with a faint aroma of wine. It is also a good choice to order a set of afternoon tea in front of the huge floor-to-ceiling windows. The location is superior to the Forbidden City and Wangfujing. It is very convenient to visit Wangfujing, the Forbidden City, Qianmen and Dongdan in one step. There are also hotel guests who can receive a coupon at the front desk to enjoy a 50% discount on parking in the underground parking lot, which is a worry-free and affordable stay.

name:C‚Äço‚Äçn‚Äçg‚Äçc‚Äço‚Äçn‚Äçg‚Äçx‚Äçi‚Äçy‚Äço‚Äçu

posted:Posted July 1, 2022
msg:When we talk about Legend Hotel, what are we talking about?
Internet celebrity hotel? "Palace of Versailles"? "Dream back to Portugal"? "Castle"?

I suddenly wanted to go out last weekend, and temporarily opened all the homestays in the suburbs.
When I was disheartened, I went to the Legend Hotel
At a glance, the price is only 700+! weekend! (excluding breakfast)
Almost half the price of various suburban homestays!
Is there a reason to refuse?
As a "parent-child hotel", it may be a little thin, because there are no amu*****t facilities
But kids who like swimming will definitely like it,
After all, we seemed to be contracting the entire pool that weekend afternoon!

Special toiletries and bathrobes for children
Afraid that the children would be bored, they also sent a "treasure hunt" map
From the 2nd floor to the 1st floor underground, find the corresponding "treasure" and send it to social media
You will get a small gift (hotel puzzle and a bottle of drink)

The hotel manager and receptionist are very friendly
Takeaways have dedicated shelves for easy pickup and delivery

name:F‚Äça‚Äçn‚Äçs‚Äçh‚Äçi‚Äçl‚Äçe‚Äçl‚Äçe
info:Premier Deluxe Room (Double bed)
info:Stayed in June 2022
info:Family
info:19 Reviews
rating:4.7
posted:Posted June 27, 2022
msg:Two-day in-depth hotel tour on weekends, let‚Äôs talk about the overall feeling first. It‚Äôs a great experience, and I want to go again, but there are indeed a few unsatisfactory places.
The whole hotel has a European palace style, and it feels like a king when you are in it. From the third underground floor to the seventeenth floor, it is the hotel's own, which is very beautiful and easy to visit.
The implementation of epidemic prevention measures is particularly in place. No matter where you go to the hotel, you need to scan the code, understand and support, so as to ensure everyone's safety.
The room is big, clean and tidy, the sound insulation effect is super good, the open corridor, so many floor rooms, can't hear any noise. The items and other equipment are very complete, the bedding is clean and comfortable, the mattress is very comfortable, the air conditioning is sufficient, the temperature can be adjusted, and the stay is very good.
The food is good, the taste is rich, the service staff is warm and polite, the lunch and dinner are Western-style ordering, and the breakfast buffet is relatively rich. The overall feeling is good, but I am a little dissatisfied. There are many people for dinner, and the speed of serving food is very slow. We can understand this. After all, five-star hotels must ensure the quality of meals and dining experience. However, one of the main dishes we ordered has never been served. After being urged once, the waiter went to the kitchen and turned back to check with us, but it still never came. When I urged the second time, the waiter seemed to be lighthearted and said, "They said they've done it to you, so I'll go to remind you again", which made people feel very uncomfortable. But I didn't say anything. In the end, the main food came up, which was very unsatisfactory. Everything else was good.
During the epidemic, the fitness center needs to make an appoin**ent, and the management is in place. The swimming pool is not big, there are not many people, the water temperature is very suitable, and it is very comfortable to stay in it. Saunas and steam baths are open as normal. The gym is a bit small, but the equipment is adequate. The whole is very clean, and there are plastic bags in the bathroom, which is quite thoughtful.
Great service, thoughtful and thoughtful, overall is good, but there is a small problem. When checking in, the front desk provided disposable supplies for adults, and told the children that they would be delivered to the room, but after ten o'clock in the evening, no one came to deliver them. I called the front desk and asked for it myself, which is not a good feeling, said I can be picky, but after all, it is a five-star hotel, and guests still have expectations for service quality! By the way, the hotel has a treasure game for children. After completing it, it will give you a small gift, which is very good and a surprise.
Overall, a very satisfying holiday experience!

msg:On the weekend when the forecast temperature is as high as 40 degrees, choose to take your children to the Legend Hotel for swimming and treasure hunting to escape the sweltering heat.
Now the price of the suite is very favorable, including three meals and one afternoon tea. The arrangement is clear and clear, and there is no need to leave the hotel. It can be seen that the hotel product manager has made great efforts to cope with the impact of the epidemic on the hotel, and is very attentive, attracting many local customers like us to spend the weekend.
üöó Transportation: Needless to say, the location is superior. The hotel has a 50% discount on parking, which is much more affordable than the luxury hotels in China World Trade Center.
üßπSanitation: The sanitary conditions are very good, the bath towels are hot and fragrant, the only dissatisfaction is that the years are old, the carpets are a little old, and the lockers have a musty smell of wood.
üçÉEnvironment: Palace style, but because of the sophisticated materials and careful maintenance, it is gorgeous and not gaudy. Attracted a lot of people to take pictures and punch cards. However, I don't like a few scantily clad and vulgar women who stay in the lobby bar for a few hours (from 2 pm to 8 pm) and keep taking pictures forever. Are they really embarrassed?
Service: very good, decent, elegant, not overly enthusiastic, but responsive.
Should come again for the weekend.

msg:Very beautiful hotel, like a palace, I didn't expect it to be so big and so spectacular. Several antique decorations, antique murals, antique vases, etc. in the hall. There is a large hall on the ground floor, as well as antique crystal lamps, conference rooms, etc. The hotel has complete facilities, swimming pool, sauna, gym, haircut, and spa. The swimming sauna is open until 11:00, and the spa is open until 2:00 at night. The room is very beautiful, the bathroom is too delicate, behind the toilet door, the sink cabinet door are all mirrors.
Hygiene: the bathroom is clean, the carpet in the room has imprints, but it is acceptable. It will inevitably change color over time. The bed was comfortable and the quilt was hot. Toiletries are L'Occitane.
Catering: The suite is paired with lunch, dinner and afternoon tea, with simple meals written. The variety of meals is limited, but acceptable, there is no problem with eating enough, one main course per person, salad fruit drinks and small pizza buffet. There is still room for improvement in food taste. Afternoon tea desserts are sweeter.
During the epidemic, I felt that there were fewer people staying in the hotel, and the building was very quiet, but it was also very enjoyable. The all-inclusive price is more cost-effective, with meals and convenient, very close to Wangfujing Pedestrian Street, convenient for shopping, it is a good choice

name:A‚Äçn‚Äço‚Äçn‚Äçy‚Äçm‚Äço‚Äçu‚Äçs‚Äç ‚ÄçU‚Äçs‚Äçe‚Äçr

info:Stayed in March 2022

info:7 Reviews
rating:5
posted:Posted April 2, 2022
msg:The hotel lobby and restaurant, which were usually slightly noisy, are now extraordinarily quiet during this extraordinary period. The window seat of the French restaurant faces the former residence of Mr. Cai Yuanpei. The artwork in the hotel makes you feel like you are in a palace of art. The number of guests has dropped sharply, but the service has not been discounted, and everyone is smiling. I especially like Miss Shi, the duty manager for solving problems for the guests in a timely manner. The simple meal for two included in the administrative courtesy is much more refined than the so-called simple meal provided by the administrative courtesy of some other big-name five-star hotels in Beijing. The service is also in place as always, without any decline. . I have stayed in several other five-star hotels during the epidemic, and the services have been more or less discounted. Legend's gym, swimming pool, and sauna are still open all day, until 11 pm, which is too rare. In some hotels, due to the sudden drop in guests during the epidemic, the swimming pool and gym are either closed or only open for half a day in the afternoon.
The room is very convenient, whether it is on the bedside or the USD socket of the writing desk.
Located in Jinbao Street, it is a quiet holiday, the first choice for business trips.

name:H‚Äça‚Äçn‚Äçj‚Äçi‚Äça‚Äçn‚Äçg‚Äç ‚ÄçH‚Äç√°‚Äçn‚ÄçJ‚Äçi‚ÄçƒÅ‚Äçn‚Äçg

posted:Posted January 20, 2022
msg:Now Beijing and Shanghai are popular in their own cities for vacation, there is no way, not only can't go abroad, but it is difficult to go domestically, so I chose Legendale Hotel. Let‚Äôs talk about the location first. It‚Äôs very close to Wangfujing. You can walk to the Forbidden City, Jingshan, Beihai, and art museums. Besides, the style of Legendale Hotel Beijing is particularly European in appearance. The grey roof seems to be like being in Paris. Anyway, you can't go abroad, so choose a city vacation with your own personality, and you should live in a luxury hotel in Paris!

The main building of Legendale Hotel is enclosed, so friends who are afraid of the tail room need not worry, there is no tail room at all. The whole room is also European-style retro design. The curtains, furnishings, decorations, and oil paintings have a particularly unified style. Even the mirror above the bedroom door is also an old-fashioned design, showing a good look. The faucet in the bathroom is 24k gold-plated, and the hot and cold water are separated, which is how a classical luxury hotel is configured. There are quite a lot of European-style hotels, but there are not many that have quality and high standards.

The scenery outside the window of Legendale Hotel is full of scenery. From my window, I can see the buildings of the East Third Ring Road and Chang'an Street, and some can also see Wangfujing, the Forbidden City and Jingshan. Just in time for the first snow in Beijing in 2022, it is really beautiful. The bathroom accessories are a full set of L'Occitane, the surface of the bathrobe is silk and the inside is a towel, and the slippers are coral fleece, which is very comfortable to use. The flowers in the living room are all real flowers, and the roses in the bathroom are also real flowers. Legend is too particular about it.

The executive suite on the 15th floor can enjoy the trea**ent of the executive lounge, including four meals a day for two people, afternoon tea and dinner on the day of check-in, as well as breakfast and lunch the next day. There are both Western and Chinese food. . In general, there is no lunch in the executive lounge of the hotel, and dinner is also very simple, not as grand as Legendale. At present, these four meals are enjoyed at the Beicui French Restaurant on the 2nd floor, and outside the window is the former residence of Cai Yuanpei.

When I arrived at Legendale Hotel, many people were enjoying afternoon tea in the lobby bar in the atrium. There were quite a lot of guests in the hotel. The lobby is too European-style, and the high atrium space is especially like a castle. The fireplace in the middle is said to be a real antique, and there are some antique clocks, all of which are hundreds or hundreds of years old collected from Europe. The fitness center is located on the 2nd floor, which can fully relax and leisure, which is indispensable for a vacation in the city. In-house guests can also receive coupons at the front desk and enjoy a 50% discount on the underground parking lot.

msg:üöø Legendale Hotel Beijing‰∏®Every detail is worth savoring

üõéPeople usually think that what is left after the prosperity has retreated is the memory that will not be forgotten by people. Today, the ‚Äúold‚Äù hotels with retro personality, full of details and nostalgic complexes are more time-consuming than modern luxury hotels.

üóùBeijing Legend Hotel is such an existence. The architectural appearance of the hotel draws on the European neoclassical style. The beige exterior walls are integrated, and the natural style is mysterious and low-key among the surrounding buildings. The room continues the neoclassical style, and every delicate carving is ingenious.

ü™úThe neoclassical color scheme inherits the elegant charm of European classics. The hollow ring design above the lobby makes the white, gold, dark red, and yellow in the neoclassical color scheme even better. The rooms are set up in a circle. From the lobby to the top floor, they are all hollow cylinders with warm lighting. Their natural and heavy texture seems to be trying to pull people back to the golden age where wonderful stories and moving legends are hidden...

üõÅ I stayed in a suite this time. The room is full of details, so people have to express their admiration to the team who designed the hotel after careful consideration. The most surprising is the unique retro valve design of the bathroom faucet, which maximizes the sense of ritual while being practical. The hotel has seven restaurants, ranging from French to Cantonese, with a wide variety of dishes. Ordering a set of afternoon tea in front of the huge floor-to-ceiling windows, and being in a daze, is not a happy thing.

The lobby has an empty palace-like beauty, and it is worthy of being the most popular check-in place in the capital! The room is also super spacious, with gorgeous decorations like living in a palace!

After seeing the strategies posted by other friends, I realized that there are still six treasures hidden in this hotel, all of which are antiques collected by the boss and are of great value. They are displayed on the second, first and ba*****t floors of the hotel. Take the kids to check in for treasure hunts and take pictures, and get a puzzle gift! Simply so much fun!

His restaurant is also great! The French restaurant on the second floor is like an art gallery! You can have afternoon tea, breakfast, lunch and dinner here. The Chinese restaurant on the ground floor is also super delicious!

I love this hotel so much and will continue to bring my family here!

name:M‚Äçe‚Äçi‚Äçl‚Äçi‚Äçs‚Äçh‚Äçi‚Äçz‚Äçu

posted:Posted January 15, 2022
msg:It has been nine years since the last time I stayed at the Legendale Hotel. Every year at the end of the year, some feelings emerge, and I suddenly thought of whether I should go to experience the current Legendary hotel again? On Ctrip, I saw that there is a "four-meal package" activity for staying in an executive suite. The price is also quite cost-effective, so I quickly placed the order.

Checked in after 2pm, the room was sunny and received a fruit plate and chocolate. Spreading out on the sofa and basking in the sun just doesn't want to move... This is the correct way to enjoy the afternoon in the northern winter!

The rooms on the executive floor can not only check out until three o'clock, but also include four meals a day, including breakfast, lunch, afternoon tea and dinner. The dining places are all in the French restaurant on the second floor. In fact, there is an executive lounge on the 16th floor, but it is not currently open. According to my memory, the executive lounge does not have many seats, and it is not as spacious and bright as the French restaurant, so I think this temporary adjus**ent is not bad!

I heard that the breakfast is a very rich buffet, but I was too lazy to get up (the bed was so comfortable), I slept until noon hahahaha, I went straight downstairs to have lunch, and I could choose appetizers, soups, main dishes, Dessert, free combination, very convenient, also includes a variety of soft drinks, hot tea and coffee. Dinner is also very rich, including Chinese and Western-style cold and hot dishes, and so on.

Although the free afternoon tea is not as "luxury" as the lobby on the first floor, I think it is quite attentive and exquisite in the hotel's executive afternoon tea. If you like quiet, the environment here is more suitable, praise!

Finally, I would like to praise the hotel's "New Year's taste". Red lanterns and blessing characters can be seen everywhere. It is very interesting to collide with the retro European style. In fact, it is also quite good to have a New Year's Eve dinner at a Chinese restaurant here!

msg:Due to various policy reasons, the original vacation plan can only be cancelled and stay in Beijing. However, the feeling of wanting to take a vacation has not diminished at all, so I chose a weekend, found a hotel in the city that has always been planting grass, and came to a city vacation plan that said that I would live there.

Every time I passed by the Wangfujing area before, I would be attracted by the appearance of Legendale Hotel! It feels like a castle. I heard that it opened in 2008. Even though it has been more than ten years, it is still very beautiful. It is like Versailles! Some time ago, I had a meal in the hotel's Chinese restaurant, and then I was planted again by the hotel's decoration. Luxurious European-style, imposing 17-storey atrium-style structure is simply too much! So I always wanted to come and live for two days to experience it. So I checked the price this time and found that it was very suitable, so I placed the order directly.

When I came here, it happened to be the afternoon of the weekend, and there were many people checking in. This time, I stayed in the executive suite on the 15th floor of the hotel. The classic style of the hotel has continued from the public space to the room. The classical furniture in the living room and the design of the European-style ceiling really have a feeling of being in southern Europe. The large bed in the bedroom is very comfortable to lie on, and the wide glass window next to it has an excellent view. From the residential house in front of you to the Guomao in the distance, it seems that you can see the modern and modern from Homecoming in Beijing at a glance.

The bathroom space is impressively large, and it also reflects the retro elements incisively and vividly. The faucet of the washbasin is divided into two hot and cold, and is plated with gold, which is basically the standard configuration of classical hotels. The bath accessories are a full set of L'Occitane, and the scent is the type I like. Don't forget to wear your hotel bathrobe after taking a shower! The surface is silk and the inside of the towel is super comfortable! !

The hotel's executive courtesy includes four meals from breakfast, lunch to afternoon tea and dinner. Since the executive lounge is currently not open, all meals are served in the hotel's French restaurant. There are not many types of afternoon tea, but the a**osphere is very good, and the breakfast tastes good. It can be said that the price is still very high. Because I happened to have friends nearby on weekends, I ate dinner at another Chinese restaurant. The dishes of Jiangnan flavor, eel paste, gluten stuffed meat, and smoked fish were all very good! It should be there for dinner later.

msg:üåá Legendale Hotel is an Internet celebrity hotel in Beijing, where you can experience the most magnificent visual impact. Symmetrical structural architectural design, European-style palace decoration style, very suitable for photography, it is also a good place for photography enthusiasts.

üåÉ At first glance, the beige exterior wall gives people a warm and indifferent emotion. It looks low-key but extremely mysterious in many high-rise buildings, which makes people want to find out. Entering the hotel is also very in line with the appearance expectations. Standing on the top floor of the hotel, leaning over and looking down, it is resplendent and dazzling, and it feels like being in an imperial palace.

ü•ò During the days I stayed at the hotel, I ate three meals a day and lunch at the Beacon French Restaurant on the second floor. Whether in terms of accommodation or food, Legend has done a very good job in line with its own temperament. Decorate the walls with marble for a somber ambience and pave with royal blue rugs for a visual impact. There are crystal lamps hanging high above the head, and the small partners in various restaurants show the details of Legend, making everything look high-end and a**osphere.

üìçThe hotel is located on Jinbao Street, Dongcheng District. The transportation is very convenient. The airport express line goes directly to the door of the hotel, and the subway and walking are very convenient. Wangfujing and Sanlitun are also near Legendale. When you are bored, you can see the special places in Beijing as soon as you step out of the hotel door.

‚ù§Ô∏èAlthough it has been 14 years since Legend Hotel opened, its style and decoration are still magnificent. Walking in the hotel, I feel like I am in a movie scene, I am the protagonist in the hotel üòé

name:X‚Äçi‚Äça‚Äçm‚Äça‚Äçy‚Äça
info:Deluxe Double Room
info:Stayed in September 2021
info:Family
info:1 Review
rating:5
posted:Posted September 8, 2021
msg:Exit the Dengshikou subway, and cross the road to the Legendale Hotel. The Versailles-style design is very stunning, with an illusion of being in Europe. The 17-story atrium design in the lobby is very fantastic and is a popular place to check in. The beauty and wealth here come from every detail and collection of treasures, such as crystal chandeliers, the only fireplace hall in Beijing, French gold mirrors, and Baroque decorations. After so many years, they are still exquisite and shiny. In addition, there is a small garden behind the hotel, which is really a paradise in the second ring road. It is very convenient to walk to Wangfujing, Art Museum, and Sanlian Bookstore.

Luckily, the staff helped us upgrade. The guest rooms are very comfortable, and the size and luxury of the executive suites cannot be replaced by the "fashionable design" of those new hotels. The suite is very spacious. The hotel has placed a comfortable bed for children under the outer window very intimately. The children voluntarily climbed up without crowding with us. Once the door is closed, there are two worlds. The coffee machine in the room, L‚ÄôOccitane toiletries, soft carpet slippers are all available, and a pack of exquisite L‚ÄôOccitane lipstick and hand cream is also given when turning the bed down. What moved me the most was that I thought that as an old hotel, there would be no usb sockets, but I found that all the sockets with usb were kindly offered.

The swimming pool located on the second floor must be praised. The shape and design are very luxurious, and it has the feeling of a Roman spa. The water in the pool is clean, the temperature is just right, there are not many people, and there are massage chairs in the pool. The staff at the swimming pool is very responsible. We let the child go into the water first, then turn around to put the towels. In two or three minutes, the staff reminds us to take good care of the child and don‚Äôt let him be alone in the water. In addition, if there is a little water on the ground, the staff will wipe it clean.

The Haojiangxuan Chinese Restaurant on the ba*****t floor is a pleasant surprise. It is said that the master of the state banquet, Zhao Renliang, is in charge of his Jiangnan cuisine. Some of my favorite dishes are stewed lion head, moray eel paste, dried mushroom and shrimp Taizhou tofu, iron stick yam, even if you don‚Äôt live in a hotel, you might as well come here for a small gathering. The stewed lion head is really delicious. It is said that the cooking process is very complicated and delicate, and the clear soup is oil-free, fragrant and not greasy. The eel paste is the best I've ever eaten, especially with rice. However, no matter how much you eat, you still have to leave room for a red noodle soup. Sometimes there is no place to eat at noon, so you can come and order one by yourself. It is delicious with a plate of yam and fennel beans. In addition, the iced crayfish in summer is also an extremist. After the season, the current drunken crabs can just be replaced. The "June Yellow" yellow is really full.

For breakfast in the French restaurant, there is a wide selection of Chinese and Western dishes and dim sum. Among them, I like wanton noodles and fried dough sticks the most.

msg:Legendale Hotel, whether in Wangfujing area or Beijing city, is a special place. Refreshing.
The journey starts from the moment of looking at the exterior of the hotel. The buildings like the Palace of Versailles built by Mr. Li have different responses from the outside to the inside. Walking into the lobby, the vertical 17-story high-rise space, looking up, really has a palace-like design style. The lobby is formally entered into a palace (it is exactly the same as the temperament of the second ring of the capital). With crystal chandeliers, the only fireplace hall in Beijing, French gold-inlaid mirrors and Baroque sculpture decorations, and marble and granite floors, the line of sight will involuntarily be missed by the French or Portuguese chairs in the lobby bar. Extraordinary style.

On the right hand side of the main entrance, behind the floral arrangement is the front desk, which gives the residents a good degree of privacy. Check-in was quick, and the room was easily reached by a 6-step elevator. This time I stayed in a suite. There are also many painting decorations in the stairwell. Baroque reliefs and chandeliers create a foreign holiday style.

Pushing open the door, the overall tone is white and beige with a light tone, the hallway in, the living room, floor lamps, and behind the bookcases are the beautiful scenery of the third ring and the second ring, and the line of sight is far away. The bedroom and ensuite bathroom are very good, and the privacy is also relevant. The marble floor, L‚ÄôOccitane's spare parts, and the double-basin countertops have been kept in good quality for so many years. The bedding is comfortable and the softness is just right. My favorite is that the door is ajar, which can reveal the dim light and shadow of the lamp just opposite. The sound insulation effect is also very good, and the quality of sleep is guaranteed.

Welcome fruits and chocolates are all available, and the minibar is also a newer refrigerator like. There is sweet honey on the coffee machine. The color of the overall suite is blue and white, and the color is also reminiscent of the elegance of European royal families.
Breakfast is in the coffee shop, egg rolls and chicken noodle soup are good, and the coffee is also good. There are not many people on weekends. The most recommended is the scenic swimming pool, 25 meters in standard, with Baroque oil paintings inlaid on both sides, and the swimming pool is full of style.

By the way, the Chinese restaurant on the B1 floor is also the highlight of this time! Unexpectedly, there is a treasure Huaiyang restaurant hidden here. I tried the yellow croaker set meal that is in the promotion season, including yellow croaker pasta, yellow croaker soup, fried yellow croaker with ginger slices, peach kernel tomato, and my favorite fried fish fillet. The last dessert was sweet-scented sweet-scented osmanthus taro seedlings that I haven't eaten for a long time. The overall style is very similar to those characteristic hotels in Macau, such as Wynn Palace.

Holiday in the city, feel Macau or European style, Legendale Hotel is really special in this city.

name:H‚Äça‚Äçn‚Äçx‚Äçi‚Äça‚Äço‚Äçk‚Äça‚Äçi

info:Stayed in August 2021
info:Solo travelers
info:1 Review
rating:5
posted:Posted August 31, 2021
msg:This is a five-star hotel located on Jinbao Street, at the intersection of the ancient city and the modern city.

As far as I can see, the European theater-style box design, the 17-storey atrium, row upon row, you can see the ceiling directly. The luxurious lobby displays a priceless fireplace, carved with a statue of "Bloody Mary", a rare 300-year-old clock passed down from the time of Louis XIV... It‚Äôs so moat, the style of the Bourbon dynasty, on the banks of the Seine The style is worthy of being the most Parisian boundary under the imperial city roots.

The corridor of the floor is designed as a theater box. There will be elevator signs every some distance. To enter the elevator, you need to insert the card first and then press the arrival floor. The room card can go to the first and second floors. You can only swipe this floor. Invalid guest room floor. The hotel has 6 elevators for guests to use, and each elevator is equipped with a disabled button, which is also one of the detailed indicators of a five-star hotel.

Each of the guest rooms and suites has complex and gorgeous decorations, full of charming style. The Baroque style is presented in noble yellow and royal blue as the main tones, and the marble-covered bathroom is more luxurious in the hotel.

The "Haojiangxuan" named after Guangdong Haojiang is arranged on the B1 floor, with golden yellow traditional Chinese patterns all over all corners. The base color of Chinese red and mahogany furniture all highlight its pure Chinese characteristics. The lofty dome and recessed lighting in the lobby bring a sense of open space, and the most unique one is the dome structure in the private room with the "Ching Ming Shang River" painted.

"Haojiangxuan" is managed by the national treasure-level culinary master, state banquet master, and Zhao Renliang.

In addition to the delicious and delicious aged Huadiao crayfish, you can also eat many classic dishes of Master Zhao here. I really love the fennel beans with a side dish, and the surf puffer fish I saw and ate for the first time. There are also stewed lion's head, eel paste, Xiaoshan radish dried peony shrimp balls, fried Zhoushan large yellow croaker with rice cake and so on. It's so delicious and so enjoyable.
